desc: Major footwear brands like Brooks, Hoka, Birkenstock, Hey Dude, Taos, Timberland Pro, Keen, Oboz, Patagonia and more! We also carry a wide variety of Boutique items and adorable apparel and have the most extensive safety footwear in Madison County!

layout.text: Huge Selection of Running and Athletic Shoes

We have a massive selection of your favorite running shoes. We have a wide variety of colors and sizes in brands like Brooks, Hoka, On Running, Altra, and New Balance.
Shop Local at Soft Shoe in Richmond KY
... we are so much more than shoes!
